#summary List of all of the API calls, their parameters, errors and expected responses. You should only need this page if you are NOT using one of the TokBox provided SDKs

==Call API Actions==
  * [http://code.google.com/p/tokboxapi/wiki/CreateCall Create Call]
    * Create a call and return the media server address and call id. 

  * [http://code.google.com/p/tokboxapi/wiki/CreateInvite Create Invite]
    * Create an invite to a particular call and return an invite id.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/tokboxapi/wiki/JoinCall Join Call]
    *Get the media server / callId from an inviteId.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/tokboxapi/wiki/ValidateCallID Validate Call ID]
    * Returns whether or not a call id still exists

==Contacts API Actions==
  * [http://code.google.com/p/tokboxapi/wiki/AddContact Add Contact]
    * Add users to your TokBox contact list.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/tokboxapi/wiki/IsFriend Is Friend]
    * Get the relation between two users.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/tokboxapi/wiki/RemoveContact Remove Contact]
    * Remove a user from your TokBox contact list.

==Feed API Actions==
  * [http://code.google.com/p/tokboxapi/wiki/DeleteMissedCallEvent Delete Call Event from Feed]
    * Delete a call event from the feed

  * [http://code.google.com/p/tokboxapi/wiki/DeleteVMail Delete VMail from Feed]
    * Removes a video mail from a user's feed/inbox.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/tokboxapi/wiki/GetFeed Get Feed]
    * Return the user's feed.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/tokboxapi/wiki/GetFeedUnreadCount Get Feed Unread Count]
    * Returns the number of unread feed items

  * [http://code.google.com/p/tokboxapi/wiki/MarkCallEventViewed Mark Call Event Viewed]
    * Mark a call event as viewed

  * [http://code.google.com/p/tokboxapi/wiki/MarkVMailAsRead Mark VMail as Read]
    * Mark a video mail read.

==Token API Actions==
  * [http://code.google.com/p/tokboxapi/wiki/GetRequestToken Get Request Token]
    * Creates a request token tied to the creating partner.
    * This can be exchanged on the TokBox site for an access token, which is then passed to API calls as authentication on user actions.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/tokboxapi/wiki/GetAccessToken Get Access Token]
    * Allows a developer to programmatically get an access token for a user who has authorized them

  * [http://code.google.com/p/tokboxapi/wiki/ValidateAccessToken Validate Access Token]
    * Ensures that the access token and the associated user are correlated by the TokBox system.

==User API Actions==
  * [http://code.google.com/p/tokboxapi/wiki/CreateGuestUser Create Guest User]
    * Create a guest user on the TokBox jabber server to make/receive calls.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/tokboxapi/wiki/GetUserProfile Get User Profile]
    * Returns - User ID, Jabber ID, First Name, Last Name, Display Name, Username - about a user.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/tokboxapi/wiki/RegisterUser Register User]
    * Register a user with the system

==VMail API Actions==
  * [Forward VMail]
    * Forward a video mail to either TokBox contacts or a list of e-mail contacts.

  * [Get VMail]
    * Return information about a video mail

  * [Send VMail]
    * Send a video mail to either TokBox contacts or a list of e-mail contacts.
